comment: Her weekly discussions were straight out of the textbook, I never once saw her post in any of our discussions to correct or give us feedback - even when a student was clearly reading the wrong chapter or section. Her exams are ridiculous. Grammar mistakes abound, questions that have repeated answers, etc. She is not accessible to her students.

This class is a really easy A if you do the work. Discussions every week plus one 30-40 minute powerpoint project. If you had an A in the class at the end of the semester, you were exempt from the final. She was a bit scatterbrained, and I often was confused about her expectations of us. Otherwise she was great and I'd recommend her
